subtitles_with_timestamps.text: Hey, would you all relax? It's not that big a deal.
RACHEL: Marcel, stop it! Marcel! Bad monkey!
Let's just say my Curious George doll is no longer curious.

subtitles_without_timestamps: Hey, would you all relax? It's not that big a deal.
RACHEL: Marcel, stop it! Marcel! Bad monkey!
Let's just say my Curious George doll is no longer curious.
